QuestData.Title: Reagents of De-Necromancy
QuestData.Description:
I fear the spirits will be unable to find their tombs, even if we release them from the Ukhel's grip.
The Ukhel are also raising the ancestors' animal companions who guided and protected them in life.
Bring me the skulls of those animals, and the sacred soil disturbed by these enemies. Combined, these reagents should help the ancestors find peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Intact Skulls from risen companions and $2oa Clumps of Sacred Soil.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Zorig further in the Eternal Kurgans.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect! I should be able to use these to release them from the Ukhel. Then they can return to the rest they deserve.
